00011 const double          DeciderUWBIRED::noiseVariance        = 101.085E-12; // P=-116.9 dBW // 404.34E-12;   v²=s²=4kb T R B (T=293 K)
00012 const double          DeciderUWBIRED::peakPulsePower       = 1.3E-3; //1.3E-3 W peak power of pulse to reach  0dBm during burst; // peak instantaneous power of the transmitted pulse (A=0.6V) : 7E-3 W. But peak limit is 0 dBm
00013 const simsignalwrap_t DeciderUWBIRED::catUWBIRPacketSignal = simsignalwrap_t(MIXIM_SIGNAL_UWBIRPACKET_NAME);

00015 simtime_t DeciderUWBIRED::processSignal(AirFrame* frame) {
00016   Signal* s = &frame->getSignal();
00017   map<Signal*, int>::iterator it = currentSignals.find(s);
00018 
00019   if (it == currentSignals.end()) {
00020     return handleNewSignal(s);
00021   } else {
00022     switch (it->second) {
00023     case HEADER_OVER:
00024       return handleHeaderOver(it);
00025     case SIGNAL_OVER:
00026       return handleSignalOver(it, frame);
00027     default:
00028       break;
00029     }
00030   }
00031   //we should never get here!
00032   assert(false);
00033   return 0;
00034 }
00035 
00036 simtime_t DeciderUWBIRED::handleNewSignal(Signal* s) {
00037 
00038   int currState = uwbiface->getRadioState();
00039   if (tracking == 0 && currState == RadioUWBIR::SYNC) {
00040       simtime_t endOfHeader = s->getReceptionStart()
00041         + IEEE802154A::mandatory_preambleLength;
00042       currentSignals[s] = HEADER_OVER;
00043       assert(endOfHeader> 0);
00044       return endOfHeader;
00045   } else {
00046     // we are already tracking an airframe, this is noise
00047     // or we are transmitting, switching, or sleeping
00048     currentSignals[s] = SIGNAL_OVER;
00049     simtime_t endOfSignal = s->getReceptionEnd();
00050     assert(endOfSignal> 0);
00051     return endOfSignal;
00052   }
00053 
00054 }
00055

00057 // We just left reception state ; we must update our information on this frame accordingly
00058 
00059 void DeciderUWBIRED::cancelReception() {
00060   if(tracking != NULL) {
00061       tracking = NULL;
00062       synced = false;
00063   }
00064   nbCancelReceptions++;
00065 }
00066 
00067 simtime_t DeciderUWBIRED::handleHeaderOver(map<Signal*, int>::iterator& it) {
00068 
00069   int currState = uwbiface->getRadioState();
00070   Signal* s = it->first;
00071 
00072   if (tracking == 0 && currState == RadioUWBIR::SYNC) {
00073     // We are not tracking a signal currently.
00074     // Can we synchronize on this one ?
00075 
00076     bool isSyncSignalHigherThanThreshold;
00077     if(syncAlwaysSucceeds) {
00078       isSyncSignalHigherThanThreshold = true;
00079     } else {
00080       isSyncSignalHigherThanThreshold = attemptSync(s);
00081     }
00082 
00083     packet.setNbSyncAttempts(packet.getNbSyncAttempts() + 1);
00084 
00085     if(isSyncSignalHigherThanThreshold) {
00086       nbSuccessfulSyncs = nbSuccessfulSyncs + 1;
00087       tracking = s;
00088       synced = true;
00089       currentSignals[s] = SIGNAL_OVER;
00090       uwbiface->switchRadioToRX();
00091       packet.setNbSyncSuccesses(packet.getNbSyncSuccesses() + 1);
00092       // notify MAC layer through PHY layer
00093       cMessage* syncSuccessfulNotification = new cMessage("Ctrl_PHY2MAC_Sync_Success", SYNC_SUCCESS);
00094       phy->sendControlMsgToMac(syncSuccessfulNotification);
00095     } else {
00096       nbFailedSyncs = nbFailedSyncs + 1;
00097       cMessage* syncFailureNotification = new cMessage("Ctrl_PHY2MAC_Sync_Failure", SYNC_FAILURE);
00098       phy->sendControlMsgToMac(syncFailureNotification);
00099 
00100     }
00101     uwbiface->emit(catUWBIRPacketSignal, &packet);
00102 
00103   }
00104   // in any case, look at that frame again when it is finished
00105   it->second = SIGNAL_OVER;
00106   //simtime_t startOfSignal = it->first->getReceptionStart();
00107   simtime_t endOfSignal = it->first->getReceptionEnd();
00108   assert(endOfSignal> 0);
00109   return endOfSignal;
00110 }
00111 
00112 bool DeciderUWBIRED::attemptSync(Signal* s) {
00113   double snrValue;
00114   const ConstMapping *const power = s->getReceivingPower();
00115   ConstMappingIterator*     mIt   = power->createConstIterator();
00116 
00117   AirFrameVector syncVector;
00118   // Retrieve all potentially colliding airFrames
00119   phy->getChannelInfo(s->getReceptionStart(), simTime(), syncVector);
00120 
00121   if(syncVector.size() > 1) {
00122     // do not accept interferers
00123     return false;
00124   }
00125   Argument posFirstPulse(IEEE802154A::tFirstSyncPulseMax + s->getReceptionStart());
00126   mIt->jumpTo(posFirstPulse);
00127   snrValue = fabs(mIt->getValue()/getNoiseValue());
00128     syncThresholds.record(snrValue);
00129     if(snrValue > syncThreshold) {
00130       return true;
00131     } else {
00132       return false;
00133     }
00134 }
00135 
00136 simtime_t DeciderUWBIRED::handleSignalOver(map<Signal*, int>::iterator& it, AirFrame* frame) {
00137   if (it->first == tracking) {
00138     nbFinishTrackingFrames++;
00139     vector<bool>* receivedBits = new vector<bool>();
00140     AirFrameUWBIR* frameuwb = check_and_cast<AirFrameUWBIR*>(frame);
00141     cfg = frameuwb->getCfg();
00142     bool isCorrect = decodePacket(it->first, receivedBits);
00143     // we cannot compute bit error rate here
00144     // so we send the packet to the MAC layer which will compare receivedBits
00145     // with the actual bits sent (stored in the encapsulated UWBIRMacPkt object).
00146     DeciderResultUWBIR * result = new DeciderResultUWBIR(isCorrect, receivedBits, snrLastPacket);
00147     if(isCorrect) {
00148       phy->sendUp(frame, result);
00149     } else {
00150       delete frame;
00151       delete result;
00152     }
00153     currentSignals.erase(it);
00154     tracking = 0;
00155     synced = false;
00156     uwbiface->switchRadioToSync();
00157     return -1;
00158   } else {
00159     // reached end of noisy signal
00160     currentSignals.erase(it);
00161     return -1;
00162   }
00163 }
00164 
00165 /*
00166  * @brief Returns false if the packet is incorrect. If true,
00167  * the MAC layer must still compare bit values to validate the frame.
00168  */
00169 bool DeciderUWBIRED::decodePacket(Signal* signal,
00170     vector<bool> * receivedBits) {
00171 
00172   simtime_t now, offset;
00173   simtime_t aSymbol, shift, burst;
00174 
00175   packetSNIR = 0;
00176   packetNoise = 0;
00177   packetSignal = 0;
00178   packetSamples = 0;
00179 
00180   // Retrieve all potentially colliding airFrames
00181   phy->getChannelInfo(signal->getReceptionStart(), signal->getReceptionEnd(), airFrameVector);
00182 
00183   for (airFrameIter = airFrameVector.begin(); airFrameIter
00184       != airFrameVector.end(); ++airFrameIter) {
00185     Signal & aSignal = (*airFrameIter)->getSignal();
00186     offsets.push_back(signal->getReceptionStart() - aSignal.getReceptionStart());
00187     ConstMapping *const currPower = aSignal.getReceivingPower();
00188     receivingPowers.push_back(currPower);
00189     if (aSignal.getReceptionStart() == signal->getReceptionStart()
00190         && aSignal.getDuration() == signal->getDuration()) {
00191       signalPower = currPower;
00192     }
00193   }
00194 
00195   bool hasInterference = (airFrameVector.size() > 1);
00196   if(hasInterference) {
00197     nbFramesWithInterference++;
00198   } else {
00199     nbFramesWithoutInterference++;
00200   }
00201 
00202   // times are absolute
00203   offset = signal->getReceptionStart() + cfg.preambleLength;
00204   shift = cfg.shift_duration;
00205   aSymbol = cfg.data_symbol_duration;
00206   burst = cfg.burst_duration;
00207   now = offset + cfg.pulse_duration / 2;
00208   std::pair<double, double> energyZero, energyOne;
00209   IEEE802154A::setConfig(cfg);
00210   epulseAggregate = 0;
00211   enoiseAggregate = 0;
00212 
00213   // debugging information (start)
00214   if (trace) {
00215     ConstMappingIterator *const mIt = signalPower->createConstIterator();
00216     while(mIt->inRange()){
00217       receivedPulses.recordWithTimestamp(mIt->getPosition().getTime(), mIt->getValue());
00218 
00219       if(!mIt->hasNext())
00220         break;
00221 
00222       mIt->next();
00223     }
00224     /*mIt->jumpToBegin();
00225     while (mIt->hasNext()) {
00226       receivedPulses.recordWithTimestamp(mIt->getPosition().getTime(), mIt->getValue());
00227       mIt->next();
00228     }*/
00229     delete mIt;
00230   }
00231   // debugging information (end)
00232 
00233   int symbol;
00234   // Loop to decode each bit value
00235   for (symbol = 0; cfg.preambleLength + symbol
00236       * aSymbol < signal->getDuration(); symbol++) {
00237 
00238 //    int hoppingPos = IEEE802154A::getHoppingPos(symbol);
00239     int decodedBit;
00240 
00241     if (stats) {
00242       nbSymbols = nbSymbols + 1;
00243     }
00244 
00245     // sample in window zero
00246     now = now + IEEE802154A::getHoppingPos(symbol)*cfg.burst_duration;
00247     energyZero = integrateWindow(symbol, now, burst, signal);
00248     // sample in window one
00249     now = now + shift;
00250     energyOne = integrateWindow(symbol, now, burst, signal);
00251 
00252     if (energyZero.second > energyOne.second) {
00253       decodedBit = 0;
00254       packetSNIR = packetSNIR + energyZero.first;
00255       } else {
00256         decodedBit = 1;
00257       packetSNIR = packetSNIR + energyOne.first;
00258       }
00259 
00260 
00261     receivedBits->push_back(static_cast<bool>(decodedBit));
00262     //packetSamples = packetSamples + 16; // 16 EbN0 evaluations per bit
00263 
00264     now = offset + (symbol + 1) * aSymbol + cfg.pulse_duration / 2;
00265 
00266   }
00267     symbol = symbol + 1;
00268 
00269   bool isCorrect = true;
00270   if(airFrameVector.size() > 1 && alwaysFailOnDataInterference) {
00271     isCorrect = false;
00272   }
00273   packetSNIR = packetSNIR / symbol;
00274   snrLastPacket = 10*log10(packetSNIR);  // convert to dB
00275   airFrameVector.clear();
00276   receivingPowers.clear();
00277   offsets.clear();
00278 
00279   return isCorrect;
00280 }
00281 
00282 /*
00283  * @brief Returns a pair with as first value the SNIR (if the signal is not nul in this window, and 0 otherwise)
00284  * and as second value a "score" associated to this window. This score is equals to the sum for all
00285  * 16 pulse peak positions of the voltage measured by the receiver ADC.
00286  */
00287 pair<double, double> DeciderUWBIRED::integrateWindow(int /*symbol*/,
00288     simtime_t_cref pNow, simtime_t_cref burst, Signal* /*signal*/) {
00289   std::pair<double, double> energy;
00290   energy.first = 0; // stores SNIR
00291   energy.second = 0; // stores total captured window energy
00292   vector<ConstMapping*>::iterator mappingIter;
00293   Argument arg;
00294   simtime_t windowEnd = pNow + burst;
00295 
00296   double burstsnr = 0;
00297   // Triangular baseband pulses
00298   // we sample at each pulse peak
00299   // get the interpolated values of amplitude for each interferer
00300   // and add these to the peak with a random phase
00301 
00302   // we sample one point per pulse
00303   // caller has already set our time reference ("now") at the peak of the pulse
00304   for (simtime_t now = pNow; now < windowEnd; now += cfg.pulse_duration) {
00305     double signalValue = 0; // electric field from tracked signal [V/m²]
00306     double resPower = 0;    // electric field at antenna = combination of all arriving electric fields [V/m²]
00307     double vEfield = 0;   // voltage at antenna caused by electric field Efield [V]
00308     double vmeasured = 0; // voltage measured by energy-detector [V], including thermal noise
00309     double vmeasured_square = 0; // to the square [V²]
00310     double vsignal_square = 0;  // square of the voltage that would be induced on the antenna if there were no interferers (Efield=signalValue)
00311     double vnoise_square = 0; // (thermal noise + interferers noise)²
00312     double snir = 0;      // burst SNIR estimate
00313     double vThermalNoise = 0; // thermal noise realization
00314     arg.setTime(now);   // loop variable: begin by considering the first pulse
00315     int currSig = 0;
00316 
00317     // consider all interferers at this point in time
00318     for (airFrameIter = airFrameVector.begin(); airFrameIter
00319         != airFrameVector.end(); ++airFrameIter) {
00320       Signal & aSignal = (*airFrameIter)->getSignal();
00321       const ConstMapping *const currPower = aSignal.getReceivingPower();
00322       double measure = currPower->getValue(arg)*peakPulsePower; //TODO: de-normalize (peakPulsePower should be in AirFrame or in Signal, to be set at run-time)
00323 //      measure = measure * uniform(0, +1); // random point of Efield at sampling (due to pulse waveform and self interference)
00324       if (currPower == signalPower) {
00325         signalValue = measure*0.5; // we capture half of the maximum possible pulse energy to account for self  interference
00326         resPower = resPower + signalValue;
00327       } else {
00328         // take a random point within pulse envelope for interferer
00329         resPower = resPower + measure * uniform(-1, +1);
00330       }
00331       ++currSig;
00332     }
00333 
00334 //    double attenuatedPower = resPower / 10; // 10 dB = 6 dB implementation loss + 5 dB noise factor
00335     vEfield = sqrt(50*resPower); // P=V²/R
00336     // add thermal noise realization
00337     vThermalNoise = getNoiseValue();
00338     vnoise2 = pow(vThermalNoise, 2);    // for convenience
00339     vmeasured = vEfield + vThermalNoise;
00340     vmeasured_square = pow(vmeasured, 2);
00341     // signal + interference + noise
00342     energy.second = energy.second + vmeasured_square;  // collect this contribution
00343 
00344     // Now evaluates signal to noise ratio
00345     // signal converted to antenna voltage squared
00346     vsignal_square = 50*signalValue;
00347     vnoise_square = pow(sqrt(vmeasured_square) - sqrt(vsignal_square), 2); // everything - signal = noise + interfence
00348     snir = signalValue / 2.0217E-12;
00349     epulseAggregate = epulseAggregate + pow(vEfield, 2);
00350     enoiseAggregate = enoiseAggregate + vnoise2;
00351     packetSignal = packetSignal + vsignal_square;
00352     packetNoise = packetNoise + vnoise_square;
00353     snirs = snirs + snir;
00354     snirEvals = snirEvals + 1;
00355     if(signalValue > 0) {
00356       double pulseSnr = signalValue / (vnoise_square/50);
00357       burstsnr = burstsnr + pulseSnr;
00358     }
00359     energy.first = energy.first + snir;
00360 
00361   } // consider next point in time
00362   return energy;
00363 }
00364 
00365 simtime_t DeciderUWBIRED::handleChannelSenseRequest(ChannelSenseRequest* request) {
00366   if (channelSensing) {
00367     // send back the channel state
00368     request->setResult(new ChannelState(synced, 0)); // bogus rssi value (0)
00369     phy->sendControlMsgToMac(request);
00370     channelSensing = false;
00371     return -1; // do not call me back ; I have finished
00372   } else {
00373     channelSensing = true;
00374     return -1; //phy->getSimTime() + request->getSenseDuration();
00375   }
00376 }
00377 
00378 ChannelState DeciderUWBIRED::getChannelState() const {
00379   return ChannelState(true, 0);  // channel is always "sensed" free
00380 }
00381 
00382 void DeciderUWBIRED::finish() {
00383   phy->recordScalar("nbFramesWithInterference", nbFramesWithInterference);
00384   phy->recordScalar("nbFramesWithoutInterference", nbFramesWithoutInterference);
00385   phy->recordScalar("nbRandomBits", nbRandomBits);
00386   phy->recordScalar("avgThreshold", getAvgThreshold());
00387   phy->recordScalar("nbSuccessfulSyncs", nbSuccessfulSyncs);
00388   phy->recordScalar("nbFailedSyncs", nbFailedSyncs);
00389   phy->recordScalar("nbCancelReceptions", nbCancelReceptions);
00390   phy->recordScalar("nbFinishTrackingFrames", nbFinishTrackingFrames);
00391   phy->recordScalar("nbFinishNoiseFrames", nbFinishNoiseFrames);
00392 }
